title: New: Spark – Take It Back
body:
Nostalgia trip.

This new one from London’s **Spark** has a real early 00’s R&B vibe to it. Jess Morgan, a twenty one year old from Walthamstow, feels like she should be guesting on a Nelly track, with her super slick delivery, girl power agenda and uber soulful vocals. Ten years ago, this would have been straight onto the Radio I A list, that’s not to say it’s any less enjoyable now. Check out _Take It Back_ below, alongside previous single _Struck Out_.
